posts.post_content:
Free s/h.  Any form of payment accepted.  

Although PMs will be read and responded to, I very much prefer email at: [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

You can also email me for better scans, questions, comments, suggestions, etc.

A few things, so I can keep this as organized as possible:

1 -- I will address all correspondences in the order of date/time delivery into my email box (including PMs).
2 -- Please Note:  I work evenings/nights, and keep somewhat odd hours. Therefore response time may vary depending when I am on the computer. However, all correspondences will be addressed.
3 -- “I’ll take it” will take president over ongoing correspondences.
4 –  Satisfaction guaranteed.

Thanks, Scott


Scans pretty much speak for themselves, but please note:

Beckley (a), Duffy (a), and McGraw, finger, are trimmed.
McGraw, no cap, is very nice other than colored in crease.
WST on Beckley (b), Bresnahan, Marquard, and Young.

All cards are $45 each.

Most sold, here's what's left:

Beckeley (b)
Bresnahan
Duffy (a)
Griffith
McGinnity
McGraw, finger
Waddell
